name: Blood Waves
overview: A hardcore and bloody shooter through which you're gonna have to repel the attacks of the living dead using the destroying traps, defensive barricades and also weapon of close and long-range combat. Destroy zombies, get the cash and prepare yourself for the next wave. During the break you can buy necessary weapon, place the traps and defensive barricades, repair the traps survived in the previous wave. And of course, don't forget to check the stock of bullets and restore your health. Different types of zombie possess the distinctive features. There are enemies with long-distance attack as well as cleverer zombies avoiding certain traps
